item.description:
Let’s celebrate! Holidays, end of the year, starting fresh, just being alive… We don’t need a reason to feel joy, right? So let’s meditate, chant, enjoy each other!

This is a Kundalini yoga inspired class where we will do fun exercises and meditations to clear our energetic bodies and tune in to higher vibrations through our voices. Be ready to chant, meditate, be challenged, have fun and leave feeling great! Light snack will be provided as well. This is a free event, bring a friend! Saturday, December 29 at 12:00pm, 90 minutes
item.name: Holiday Celebration
